content: I am Juned, a passionate Full Stack Developer and AI Specialist based in Bengaluru, India. I specialize in building immersive 3D web applications and intelligent AI solutions. I am currently living in BTM Stage 2, Bengaluru.

You can contact me via Email: Muhammadjunaid8105@gmail.com or Phone: +91 8105238129. Connect with me on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/juned11, GitHub: github.com/junaid11P, or YouTube: youtube.com/@JunnuBlr.
My native place includes Jayaanagara, Hosanagara, Shimogga, Karnataka, India.
I currently reside at BTM Stage 2, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India.

I worked as a Full Stack Web Development Intern at Edunet Foundation. I developed an online auction platform using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node), built RESTful APIs, and optimized database queries.

I served as an AI & Robotics Master Trainer at Agilo Research (STEMpedia). I conducted sessions on AI/ML and robotics, guided students for international competitions like CODEAVOUR, and represented the company at G20 events.
I was a TinkerLab Trainer Intern at Samarthanam Trust for the Disabled. I trained students and teachers in 7 government schools on Micro:bit, app development, and 3D printing.
I interned as a System Administrator at Universal Computer Sales & Services, managing networks, server configurations, and hardware troubleshooting.

AI Guru J is my flagship project (Feb-Mar 2025). It's an Intelligent 3D Virtual Python Tutor built with React, Three.js, FastAPI, Gemini 2.5, and TikTok TTS. It features a lip-synced avatar teaching Python.
I built a Chatbot Application (Aug 2022 - Jul 2023) using React.js, Nhost, Hasura, and n8n. It's a secure real-time messaging app with email authentication.
I developed a Face Emotion Recognition system (Jan-Mar 2022) using TensorFlow, Keras, and OpenCV. It uses a CNN trained on the FER-2013 dataset to classify emotions.
I created an Online Auction Platform (May-Jun 2021) using the MERN stack, facilitating real-time bidding.
I am pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering at M. S. Ramaiah University of Applied Sciences (2023-2026), current CGPA: 8.41.
I hold a Diploma in Computer Science & Engineering from Dr. T. M. A. Pai Polytechnic, Manipal (2018-2022) with 63.25%.
My skills include: Languages (Python, Java, C, HTML, CSS), Frameworks (React, Node, Express, OpenCV, Pandas), Databases (MongoDB, MySQL), and Tools (GitHub, Docker, Arduino, Figma).
My certifications include: Generative AI (Coursera), NoSQL/Big Data (IBM), Microsoft AI Classroom, and various robotics certifications from STEMpedia.
I have trained 100+ teachers in STEM, built multiple AI applications, and created immersive 3D learning systems.
I enjoy Full Stack Dev, AI/Robotics, Video Creation, Photography, Gaming, and Content Creation on YouTube.
Hello! I am Juned's virtual assistant. How can I help you know more about him today?
I'm just a virtual avatar, but I'm ready to showcase Juned's portfolio! What would you like to see?
Goodbye! Feel free to come back if you have more questions about Juned.
